column2: The High Druid of Albion has returned from his journey to Beast Peaks and brings grave visions of impending doom. A prophecy the Phantom Queen knows all too well, with her timely arrival to ward off the Chaos Invasion. Between them, one must lead our defences and the other be the overseer in the restoration of the Waystones.
Phantom Queen shall lead our forces
Dural Durak shall lead our forces
Choose who should lead Albion on turn two

The Phantom Queen will strike fear into our enemies hearts with her magic but you must keep her from danger and atop her Raven she will prove most elusive. The most wise Durak can see to the Waystones tumultuous repair.

Durak shores up his warriors resolve in battle through magic and tactics though he is vulnerable in extended combat he can prove quite deadly atop his chariot. Morrigan's unmatched affinity with magic is best suited to the restoration of the Waystones.
